professional_summary: Professional with extensive experience in used truck sales, benefit support specialist, IT administrator, and database management. Skilled in customer relationship management, insurance processing, and technical troubleshooting.

key_responsibilities: Facilitates the purchasing and selling of equipment up to a quarter million dollars per unit.
Fosters and maintains quality customer relationships with prospects and clients.
Develops industry knowledge to assist in constructing client business models.
Assists in processing insurance quotes and registrations in a fast-paced
Uses multiple web platforms to generate insurance quotes for small to medium-sized businesses.
Ensures accurate and consistent information throughout the quote/enrollment process.
Performs daily management and allocation of escrow funds over hundreds of accounts
Maintains high attention to detail while adhering to security and confidentiality standards.
Redesigns and streamlines database systems for monitoring debits and credits to company and employee accounts.
